title: The Sound of Hip Hop
abstract: A Hip Hop artist takes us back to the beginning
description: Karim, a music teacher who works in Kensington with African youth, relates how he first discovered Hip Hop and started his love affair with music. Created as part of the 'Kensington Stories' ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with the Kensington Storytelling Festival and in partnership with VicHealth.
